review: I'm disappointed with the amazon prime advertising on the fire stick,they offer a free trial offer of prime yet amazon took 99.99 out of my account.
author: Trevor R.

review: Very nice so far. looking forward more options, and features.
author: Louis Smith

review: I love the Firestick! I can finally enjoy Amazon Video in my large screen TV!
author: Pamela S Bremer

review: This is fabulous - love Amazon Prime.  Sometimes it buffers - I've had to unplug a couple of times but love it.
author: Summit

review: I am use to Watching Netflix and Amazon prime through my Xbox or computer,  the fire TV makes my experience so much better and the picture quality is excellent well worth the money
author: Steve Dawkins

review: Easier to use than game system to watch Hulu prime and such. Glad I tried it.
author: kbezdek
